WorkItem.Description: Using the GMapControl inside a WPF Template ( DataTemplate, ControlTemplate ) it doesn't start the map properly.

Comments.Message: can you attach zipped solution of that example?
sorry for the delay. just re-add the references to your gmap4net assemblies and the sample is good to go
..i wonder why do you need that?

i make something like tycoon. and I can select some vehicles to monitor while they move. for each selected vehicle I have a new thumb in the list. it's pretty nice. at the moment my solution is to wait 1 sec after creation and rebuild the map to make it start displaying something useful. but that is not quite nice.
..well the only problem is that marker need access to its parent map, and how to do that with templates?
you can always gain access to templatedparent
